'''Skin Pack 1''', named '''Classic Skin Pack 1''' in [[Legacy Console Edition]]s for PlayStation systems and '''Skin Pack 1 - Classic''' {{in|bedrock}}, is a [[skin pack]] that includes 44 skins (originally 45) referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games.

== Skins ==
''Bedrock Edition'' includes the theme name in front of their respective skin's name e.g. Banjo-Kazooie Banjo

== Trivia ==
*A version of Skin Pack 1 was released on PlayStation 3 on March 27, 2014, on the PlayStation 3 specific version of the Skin Pack all licensed skins tied to Xbox were replaced with skins themed around PlayStation franchises.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP4433-CUSA00265_00-KSP0000000000002|website=PlayStation Store|title=Minecraft Classic Skin Pack 1}}</ref>
*The skin pack can still be bought via the Microsoft Store or the Xbox app. As of November 2025, Minecraft for Windows lists Skin Pack 1 as available DLC.
